title: [Large-scale] Metaphor-based Language Learning: Hypermedia-enhanced Educational Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and beginner-level language learning experience
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens with diverse linguistic backgrounds, with moderate familiarity with hypermedia learning environments. Digital devices are provided, but initial support for interface adaptation is required.

learning_goals: Learners can explain language concepts with 80% or higher accuracy using metaphors in a hypermedia environment
Learners can independently perform 70% or more of language tasks by applying metaphor-based learning strategies
Learners can produce language projects with 90% completion using digital hypermedia tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
